動物用藥品名稱: 默之爾家禽霍亂不活化菌苗
製造廠名稱: LOHMANN ANIMAL HEALTH INTERNATIONAL (MAINE BIOLOGICAL             LABORATORIES DIVISION)
效能(適應症): 預防巴氏桿菌1型菌引起之雞家禽霍亂及巴氏桿菌第3及第4型菌引起之火雞家禽霍亂。
成分: BACTERIAL SUSPENSION:(相當於每DOSE為0.5ML)含(A) X73 STRAIN 112,500 ML   (10^8.5CFU); (B) P1059 STRAINE 112,500ML  (10^8.5CFU); (C) P1662 STRAIN 112,500 ML  (10^8.5CFU)STERILE SALINE......88,800 ML;AQUEOUS EMULSIFIER (40% SOL.)32,100 ML;ADJUVANT (OIL PHASE) 1,071,000 MLMERTHIOLATE (10% SOL.)...............600 MLPASTEURELLA MULTOCIDA BACTERIN, AVIAN ISOLATES, TYPES 1, 3 & 4ASSEMBLY OF UNITS TO MAKE A SERIAL: REGULAR BACTERIN - AN EXAMPLEOF AN AVERAGE SERIAL OF 3000 BOTTLES (1500 LITERS):
